The story opens with Lyra Belacqua an orphan girl who lives in an alternate 
world that is similar to earth, but where people&#039;s souls exist outside of their 
bodies in animal form. The people are ruled by a shadowy and oppressive 
council known as the Magisterium, which is doing it&#039;s best to keep everyone 
from getting information about what is called "Dust." Lyra&#039;s Uncle Asriel has 
been researching Dust, and he has seen to it that Lyra is given safe shelter at 
Jordan College. But when the visiting Mrs. Coulter arrives, she asks Lyra to 
accompany her on a trip to the North to meet the Panserbjorne, a race of 
armored bears. Before Lyra leaves, the Headmaster gives her a golden compass, 
a device which only she can read, and from which she can intuit the truth.


Cast: Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig, Sam Elliott, Christopher Lee.
